alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 11:44AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pima County through 1230 PM MST... At 1144 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Three Points, or 25 miles southwest of Marana. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Three Points and San Pedro. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 144 and 149. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
